content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Magdeburg to be quite comfortable and ideally located. Let's discuss the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 400 Euros per month would be a reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. It's far below what I'm looking for. The location and quality of the apartment justify a higher rent. How about 650 Euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. I think 500 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm willing to negotiate, but 500 Euros is still lower than my expectations. How about we meet in the middle at 575 Euros per month? This is a fair price considering the amenities and the prime location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. It's still not high enough for the value of the apartment. I'm looking for a rent closer to 650 Euros per month. Would you be willing to pay that much?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are asking is too high for me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand that you may have a budget in mind, but the location and quality of the apartment are exceptional. If you're not willing to pay 650 Euros per month, I'm afraid we cannot proceed with the negotiation. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
